steps: Mix [wet] and [dry] together in a bowl.
Bake [cookable] in the oven for an hour.
Lightly glaze [cookable] with [wet] before cooking it in a pan.
Lightly dust [cooked] with [dry] to add some flavor.
Pan fry [cookable] until it closely resembles [cooked].
Thoroughly soak [cookable] in [wet] to prepare it for cooking.

recipes.name: Cinnamon Bread
steps: Combine water, flour, sugar, and yeast into a bowl and mix thoroughly.
Let the dough rise for a few hours.
Cook it in the oven for an hour.
Throw some sugar and cinnamon on top.

recipes.name: Unicorn Salmon
steps: Combine a mixture of water, brown sugar, and fairy dust in to a bowl.
Lightly glaze raw salmon in this mixture
Cook the salmon in a pan until mostly cooked.
Let it cook off on the counter.
Add unicorn horn shreddings to the surface.
